meanings.definition: To promote or sell a product or service
meanings.sent1: The company marketed their new phone by showing its features in a commercial.
meanings.sent2: The store marketed their sale with colorful flyers to attract customers.
meanings.sent3: The magician marketed his disappearing act as the greatest illusion of all time.
meanings.sent4: She marketed her skills in negotiation like a seasoned salesperson.
meanings.sent5: The chef marketed his signature dish as a culinary masterpiece.
